Section.name: About Malineni Lakshmaiah Womens Engineering College
Section.description:
Malineni Lakshmaiah Women’s Engineering was established in the year 2008 under the aegis of Malineni Perumallu Educational Society in order to provide highly efficient technical manpower in various field of engineering. It is a self financing institute located in first integrated campus of Andhra Pradesh.
Malineni Lakshmaiah Womens Engineering College AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.
